brief.product_service: AI-powered fitness and nutrition tracking mobile app for busy professionals
brief.primary_goal: Acquire 10,000 new app downloads and achieve 2,000 active paying subscribers in 90 days
brief.target_audience: Health-conscious professionals aged 25-45 who want personalized fitness guidance
brief.positioning_summary: The intelligent personal trainer in your pocket - customized workouts and nutrition plans powered by AI.
